ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: That is how We thread it into the hearts of the evildoers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: Thus do We cause (unbelief) to enter the hearts of sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Thus have We caused this (Admonition) to penetrate the hearts of the culprits (like a hot rod).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: Thus it passes through the hearts of the criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: This is how We have made (the habit of) denying embedded in the hearts of the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Thus have We caused it to enter the hearts of the criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Thus have We caused it to enter into the hearts of the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: Even so We have caused it to enter into the hearts of the sinners,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Thus do We make it traverse the hearts of the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: We have thus caused denial of truth to enter into the hearts of the sinners:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: In this wise have We made way for it into the hearts of the culprits.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: This is how We let it pass through the hearts of the guilty:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Thus have We caused it to enter the hearts of the sinners.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Thus have We caused it (the denial of the Quran) to enter the hearts of the Mujrimun (criminals, polytheists, sinners, etc.).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Even so, We have caused it to enter into the hearts of harmdoers:
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: Thus We make it pass through the hearts of the guilty.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Thus have We inserted disbelief into the hearts of the criminals.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [26:200] So, in the same way in which We would have caused denial of it to penetrate [the hearts of disbelievers] had it been recited by a non-Arab, We have caused, denial of, it to penetrate the hearts of the criminals, the Meccan disbelievers, when Muhammad (s) recites it.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Thus do We make it) the denial (traverse the hearts of the guilty) the idolaters: Abu Jahl and his host.
